caption: On a rocky, black-stoned mountainside with a rugged path, a man and a woman were walking. The woman had her hands tied in front of her, and she appeared to be a captive. They were engaged in conversation, but suddenly, the woman became highly emotional, causing the man to erupt in anger. He seemed to be venting his inner turmoil.Meanwhile, in a castle, a man was gazing out of a window, and beside him, his servant girl had prepared porridge for him. However, he showed no interest in eating it. He forced the servant girl to feed it to him. It seemed that he had suspicions about the servant girl, but then he decided to trust her because she was feeding him. He continued to look out of the window and talked while the servant girl asked him questions while feeding him.
